I think she would consider the damage control already done. She put out her video, she went on Hannity, done deal. On to the announcement. ohsocynical 20 January 2011 8:20 PM

to gain share in search, mobile drives significant growth in usage, and display becomes more meaningful," wrote Heath Terry of Canaccord, who boosted his price target to$ 800 from$ 750. While the management reshuffling adds a minor degree of uncertainty, we believe Google has significant price performance catch-up ahead, he added.
